group_1.textLeft: Mhm.

group_1.textRight: Good work, both of you!
You're very skilled, Kanagi.
It took you so little time, and they're all@done, every kind!

group_1.textLeft: It's all thanks to you that we were able to@work so efficiently, Konomi.
Konomi, Kanagi...thank you so much!
I didn't know it was possible to make the@shop look so stylish!

group_1.textRight: No need to thank me.
Right, me neither!
Just seeing how happy it made you is all@I need!

group_1.textLeft: Konomi? Are you all right?

group_1.textRight: Oh, I'm fine! [chara:303001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303001:cheek_0][chara:303001:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:303001:lipSynch_1]Just, um...
What would really tie this stylish room@together...would be Mitama in a kimono.
I think you'd look absolutely radiant in@one. It would really suit you.

group_1.textLeft: A kimono?

group_1.textRight: Oh, um...sorry for saying something so@strange...

group_1.textLeft: I don't think it's strange at all.
But I've never worn a kimono.
I've never even thought about it.

group_1.textRight: Really?
But it'd look so good on you. I'm@surprised!

group_1.textLeft: Now, that's too much praise! Calling me@the beauty of the century...

group_1.textRight: Huh? Oh, [chara:303001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303001:cheek_0][chara:303001:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:303001:lipSynch_1]uh...sure.
Well, you've decorated your store splendidly.
Wouldn't it be fitting to throw some kind of@event now?

group_1.textLeft: Ah...
A party?

group_1.textRight: Um, well...
I was sure you would host a party or have@something planned, Mitama.

group_1.textLeft: A party, hmm... That might be nice.

group_1.textRight: What? With how much you like doin' events,@a party didn't cross your mind?

group_1.textLeft: (The others mentioned a party as well.)
Hmm...
What sort of things do people do for@New Year's?

group_1.textRight: Hmm, let me see... Well, we cosplay as@shrine maidens at the cafe.
We also serve a special New Year's menu.

group_1.textLeft: Cosplay and a special menu...

group_1.textRight: Um, the shopping center near us holds events.

Like, they have sales and hold parties...@[chara:303001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303001:motion_100][chara:303001:cheek_0][chara:303001:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:303001:lipSynch_1]And there's a mochi pounding contest!

group_1.textLeft: Oooh!
(I see. Come to think of it, there's lots of@things you can do for New Year's.)
Would you two mind explaining in more@detail?

group_1.textRight: Mhm.
Yes, I'd be happy to!

group_1.textCenter: (Shrine maiden cosplay, sales, New Year's@parties, mochi contests, food...)
[chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Now you've got me thinking about all the@wonderful possibilitiesâ™ª
Perhaps even the Coordinator should offer@a few New Year's discounts?
